Package oop2.jeopardy.report

Class PdfReportGenerator

java.lang.Object
oop2.jeopardy.report.PdfReportGenerator
All Implemented Interfaces:
ReportGenerator
public class PdfReportGenerator extends Object implements ReportGenerator
Generates reports in PDF format.

  • Method Details

    • generate

      public void generate(GameHistory history, String filename) throws Exception
      Generates a PDF report summarizing the provided GameHistory.
      Specified by:
      generate in interface ReportGenerator
      Parameters:
      history - the game history to summarize
      filename - the output file path (or resource name)
      Throws:
      Exception - if an I/O or PDF generation error occurs

    • ensureSpace

      private PdfReportGenerator.PageContext ensureSpace(org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.PDDocument doc, PdfReportGenerator.PageContext ctx, org.apache.pdfbox.pdmodel.font.PDType0Font font) throws Exception
      Ensures there is sufficient space on the current page, otherwise adds a new page.
      Parameters:
      doc - the PDF document
      ctx - the current page context
      font - the font used for text measurement
      Returns:
      updated page context
      Throws:
      Exception - if creating a new page/content stream fails
